modules.description: Provides functions to parse, manipulate, and solve CUDF (Common Update Description Format) documents, including dependency resolution and conflict detection. Works with structured data types such as package descriptions, constraints, and installation states. Used to quickly generate valid package installations in controlled environments like continuous integration pipelines or local builds.

Creates a solver that filters packages from a Cudf universe based on constraints, prioritizing older versions, avoiding specific packages, or favoring installed versions. Solves for compatible package versions including required dependencies, returning selections or diagnostic messages. Extracts package versions from solver results and generates human-readable error explanations.
